SEARCH
Package Items

Class Potion

java.lang.Object
Items.ItemHero
Items.Consumable
Items.Potion
public class Potion extends Consumable
Represents a Potion in the game, extending the Consumable class. Potions can heal the hero and/or increase their strength. This class includes attributes for healing and strength increment values.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Potion

      public Potion(String name, int price, ArrayList<String> allowedTo, int healing, int strengthIncrement)
      Constructs a Potion with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the potion.
      price - The value that the Hero must pay to obtain the potion.
      allowedTo - A list of Hero types that can use the potion.
      healing - The amount of health the potion restores.
      strengthIncrement - The amount of strength the potion adds.

  • Method Details

    • showDetails

      public void showDetails()
      Prints information about the Potion to the console. This includes the potion's healing amount, strength increment, and price.
      Specified by:
      showDetails in class ItemHero
